In England, in the seven days to 12 May, there were 12,965 new confirmed cases (23.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 May, there were 12,149 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (816 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 May is 3,889,132 (6,909.5 cases per 100,000 population).
